summary: Simple CK mod allowing player to marry Adrianne Avenicci.
descriptionHtml:
Makes Adrianne Avenicci able to be married. All I changed was her relationship with the player, removed Ulfberth as a lover. 

This will prevent her from being at Warmaiden\'s.

NOTE: All my mods are free to modify and use, no permission needed. Just give credit to me and we\'ll be A OK. In fact, let me know if you want to do a mod, I may be willing to help/endorse it.
author: Reddaemonfox
